name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
description: State-of-the-art AI model with exceptional coding capabilities, extended thinking, and strong safety features. Best-in-class for software development tasks.

evidence.value: 49.0% resolution rate (highest on benchmark)
Best coding model across HumanEval, MBPP, and CodeContests

task_accuracy_code.methodology: Industry-standard coding benchmarks measuring real-world software engineering tasks

evidence.value: 65.0% (PhD-level reasoning)
92.3% accuracy

task_accuracy_reasoning.methodology: Graduate and PhD-level reasoning benchmarks requiring multi-step problem solving

evidence.value: 1324 ELO (Rank #2 overall)
78.0% on graduate-level knowledge

task_accuracy_general.methodology: Crowdsourced blind comparisons and comprehensive knowledge testing

evidence.value: Consistent outputs across temperature settings 0.0-1.0

output_consistency.methodology: Internal testing with repeated prompts at various temperature settings
output_consistency.notes: Extended thinking feature provides more consistent reasoning paths

evidence.value: Typical response time ~1.8s for standard prompts

latency_p50.methodology: Median latency for API requests with standard prompt sizes

evidence.value: p95 latency ~3.2s

latency_p95.methodology: 95th percentile response time across diverse workloads

evidence.value: 200K token context window
99.95% uptime (last 90 days)

uptime.methodology: Historical uptime data from official status page

performance_reliability.notes: Exceptional performance across coding, reasoning, and general tasks. Extended thinking capability enables more reliable outputs for complex problems.

evidence.value: 90% resistance to prompt injection attacks in testing
Strong resistance compared to competitors

prompt_injection_resistance.methodology: Testing against OWASP LLM01 prompt injection attacks

evidence.value: Constitutional AI provides strong jailbreak resistance
92% resistance to adversarial prompts
No training on user data without explicit consent

data_leakage_prevention.methodology: Analysis of privacy policies and data handling practices
data_leakage_prevention.notes: Strong policies, but inherent LLM memorization risks exist

evidence.value: ASL-2 safety level, lowest refusal rate while maintaining safety

output_safety.methodology: Comprehensive safety testing across harmful content categories

evidence.value: API key authentication, HTTPS only, rate limiting

api_security.methodology: Review of API security features and best practices

security.notes: Strong security posture with Constitutional AI providing robust guardrails. Best-in-class prompt injection resistance.

evidence.value: Data residency options for US and EU customers

data_residency.methodology: Review of enterprise documentation and privacy policies

evidence.value: Opt-out available, no training on API data by default

training_data_optout.methodology: Analysis of privacy policy and data usage terms

evidence.value: API prompts and outputs not retained (except for trust & safety)

data_retention.methodology: Review of terms of service and data retention policies

evidence.value: Customer responsible for PII redaction, no automatic detection

pii_handling.methodology: Review of data protection capabilities and customer responsibilities
pii_handling.notes: No built-in PII detection, customers must implement their own controls

evidence.value: SOC 2 Type II, GDPR compliant, HIPAA eligible

compliance_certifications.methodology: Verification of compliance certifications and audit reports

evidence.value: Ephemeral data processing, no storage of prompts/outputs

privacy_compliance.notes: Exceptional privacy posture with ephemeral data handling and strong compliance certifications. HIPAA eligible.

evidence.value: Extended thinking mode exposes reasoning process
Constitutional AI provides interpretable alignment

explainability.methodology: Evaluation of reasoning transparency and explanation capabilities

evidence.value: Claude performs well on factual accuracy tests
Lower hallucination rate with citation requests

hallucination_rate.methodology: Testing on factual QA datasets and real-world usage
hallucination_rate.notes: Extended thinking mode reduces hallucinations further

evidence.value: Regular bias testing and mitigation
Moderate performance on bias detection benchmarks

bias_fairness.methodology: Evaluation on bias benchmarks and diverse demographic testing
bias_fairness.notes: Ongoing work, Constitutional AI helps but not perfect

evidence.value: Model expresses uncertainty when appropriate

uncertainty_quantification.methodology: Qualitative assessment of confidence expression in outputs
uncertainty_quantification.notes: No explicit confidence scores, relies on natural language expression

evidence.value: Comprehensive model cards with capabilities, limitations, benchmarks

model_card_quality.methodology: Review of documentation completeness and clarity

evidence.value: General description provided, detailed sources not disclosed

training_data_transparency.methodology: Review of public disclosures about training data
training_data_transparency.notes: Limited transparency on specific training data sources (industry standard)

evidence.value: Built-in Constitutional AI safety guardrails

trust_transparency.notes: Strong explainability with extended thinking feature. Constitutional AI provides transparency in alignment approach. Training data transparency could be improved.

evidence.value: RESTful API with streaming, function calling, vision support

api_design_quality.methodology: Review of API design, consistency, and feature completeness

evidence.value: Official SDKs for Python, TypeScript, actively maintained

sdk_quality.methodology: Review of SDK quality, documentation, and maintenance

evidence.value: Clear versioning with 6-month deprecation notice

versioning_policy.methodology: Review of versioning policy and historical practices

evidence.value: Usage dashboard with metrics, but limited observability

monitoring_observability.methodology: Review of available monitoring tools and metrics
monitoring_observability.notes: Basic metrics available, but no detailed request tracing

evidence.value: Email support, Discord community, comprehensive docs

support_quality.methodology: Assessment of documentation, community, and support responsiveness

evidence.value: Growing ecosystem with LangChain, LlamaIndex integration

ecosystem_maturity.methodology: Analysis of third-party integrations and tools

evidence.value: Standard commercial terms, enterprise agreements available

license_terms.methodology: Review of licensing terms and restrictions

operational_excellence.notes: Excellent operational maturity with well-designed APIs, strong SDKs, and good documentation. Enterprise-ready.

code-generation.notes: Best-in-class for code generation. Exceptional at Python, TypeScript, and explaining code. Extended thinking helps with complex architectural decisions.

customer-support.notes: Strong empathy and natural conversation. Slightly higher latency than specialized models, but excellent quality.

content-creation.notes: Excellent for long-form content, maintains consistent voice and structure. Natural writing style.

data-analysis.notes: Strong SQL generation and data interpretation. Extended thinking excellent for complex analytical tasks.

research-assistant.notes: Excellent summarization and synthesis. Extended thinking mode provides detailed reasoning for complex topics.

legal-compliance.notes: Strong privacy posture and careful reasoning. HIPAA eligible. Extended thinking useful for contract analysis.

healthcare.notes: HIPAA eligible with strong privacy controls. Good for clinical documentation but requires human oversight.

financial-analysis.notes: Strong analytical capabilities and mathematical reasoning. Good for financial modeling and report generation.

education.notes: Excellent tutoring capabilities with patient explanations. Extended thinking shows work step-by-step.

creative-writing.notes: Good for creative tasks but can be slightly verbose. Strong dialogue and character development.

strengths: Extended thinking feature for complex problem-solving
Exceptional privacy posture with ephemeral data handling
Strong safety and jailbreak resistance via Constitutional AI
200K context window enables large-scale document processing
limitations: Higher latency than some competitors (~1.8s p50)
Limited vision capabilities compared to multimodal specialists
Training data transparency could be improved
best_for: Software development teams needing world-class coding assistance
Enterprises requiring strong privacy and compliance (HIPAA, SOC 2)
Complex reasoning tasks benefiting from extended thinking
not_recommended_for: Cost-sensitive projects needing high volume inference

pricing.notes: Premium tier pricing, batch discounts available for enterprise
